textBox.richText: The Biometric group at Idiap Research Institute is releasing its new version of biometric tools for face and speaker recognition, including a number of state-of-the-art preprocessing, feature extraction, machine learning algorithms, evaluation metrics and database protocols. These tools are based on Bob version 2 ( http://www.idiap.ch/software/bob/ ) and are available here: Tools for face recognition: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/bob.bio.face Tools for speaker recognition: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/bob.bio.spear
New release of biometrics face and speaker software
